WROOM.name: White Room
WROOM.desc: Four blank white walls and an empty ceiling and floor surround you

SROOM.name: Cavern
SROOM.desc: After falling asleep in the White Room you awaken on a dark floor surrounded by darkness

NCAV.name: Pit
NCAV.desc: You've approached a massive pit in the ground of the cavern. You can't see the bottom.

ECAV.name: Cavern
ECAV.desc: More Cavern... It has formed into a pathway leading East

SCAV.name: Cavern
SCAV.desc: Walking south leads to more cavern...

WCAV.name: Cavern
WCAV.desc: The walls in this cave glow a deep red. There is a staircase leading up at the far west end of the cavern and one going down to the south.

BPIT.name: Water Pool
BPIT.desc: You have landed in a pool of water. Slick stone surrounds you on all sides leaving no way out.

END.name: White Room
END.desc: You awaken in the White Room once again. It appears you'll be stuck here forever.

LPOOL.name: Lava Pool
LPOOL.desc: Rocks crumble behind you as you enter a room filled with lava. Your way out is blocked.

EROOM.name: Empty Room
EROOM.desc: There appears to be nothing in here...

BCAV.name: Cavern
BCAV.desc: Agh! You get swarmed by bats and carried away

SPCAV.name: Speleothem Cavern
SPCAV.desc: You walk into a room filled with speleothems.

END2.name: White Room
END2.desc: You sit up quickly as a stalactite thrusts through you. You're in the White Room again. It appears you'll be stuck here forever.

END3.name: White Room
END3.desc: You awaken in the White Room once again after being dropped from the top of the cavern by the bats. It appears you'll be stuck here forever.

END4.name: White Room
END4.desc: After walking for hours you awaken in the White Room once again. It appears you'll be stuck here forever.

END5.name: Hell
END5.desc: You are greeted as you walk down the stairs into the entrance to Hell.
